articles.content: MISSION VIEJO, Calif. (KCAL/KCBS) - A California man contracted COVID-19 after receiving both doses of the Pfizer vaccine. Health experts warn this could become more common due to the virus variants … [+1964 chars]

articles.author: Lucas Manfredi
articles.title: At least 36 people may have developed a rare blood disorder after covid vaccination: report - Fox News
articles.description: The cases were reported to the government's Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System, which relies on individuals to send reports to the FDA, CDC, and does not indicate whether vaccines actually caused the problems.
articles.content: At least 36 people may have developed a rare blood disorder, known as immune thrombocytopenia (ITP), after taking either Pfizer and BioNTech or Moderna's COVID-19 vaccines, according to a report by t… [+6268 chars]
